channel.title: Digital Plumbing on Error States
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Plumbing on Error States

item.title: 006 - Maintenance Needed
item.description: Not quite broken. A cola machine sits around, waiting to be maintained. Someone must have opened it, started to work, and then - inevitable distracted - forgot about it without finishing the work. It was there when the movie started, it was there when the movie ended. The staff walk by, either not caring or not knowing what to do. [Continue Reading]
